The US did not lose the Korean War; it ended in a stalemate. The war was beginning to escalate into a larger regional conflict, and neither side had the stomach to push for reunification at the risk of World War III.

Hank, I am all for using """"incentives"""" as a motivator for change that is good for """"we the people,"""" especially when trying to modify an entrenched mindset such as fossil fuel powered cars. Please keep in mind that only the first 200,000 cars get the break.

Trump and his supporters want the freedom to do what Singapore already has the freedom to do - give its own citizens """"priority"""", discriminate against permanent residents and foreigners in education, housing, medical care, scholarships, jobs, etc. My favorite """"line"""": """"Treating permanent residents and foreigners equally with Singaporeans is discrimination against Singaporeans!!"""" Even undocumented immigrants in American have more rights than legal foreign residents in Singapore - such as access to public schooling. How can we begrudge America for wishing to emulate Singapore's policies towards its permanent residents and legal foreign residents, not to mention undocumented immigrants and refugees? Can you imagine if Singapore and the US ever treated each other tit for tat - you hire one of ours and we'll hire one of your; you allow one of ours into your schools and we'll allow one of yours into our schools, you give one of ours a scholarship and we'll give one of yours a scholarship, etc.?
There's actually no direct evidence he was ever on the earth. So there's that.

Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".
